summary: 1950s Madrid: The agoraphobic Montse raised her now 18 y.o. kid sister. The upstairs neighbor falls down the stairs and breaks a leg. The crazy Montse takes him in.
cast: Macarena Gómez|Nadia de Santiago|Hugo Silva|Luis Tosar|Gracia Olayo|Lucía de la Fuente|Carolina Bang|Tomás del Estal|Kágel Martínez|Pedro Ruigómez|Asier Etxeandia|Silvia Alonso|Jimena Bang|Clara Valencia|Alberto Bang|Magdalena Brotto|Mariam Torres|Gala Blanco
keywords: agoraphobia|incest|father daughter relationship|sister sister relationship|broken leg
title: Musarañas
